CSV-PPT Generator

How to use this tool:

1. Upload a CSV file below. Make sure it has the following columns: companyName, website, concept, metWith, riskOpp, keyFigures, briefSummary, mainTakeaways, potentialConnections

2. You may edit fields, reorder rows, deselect rows, and deselect fields. If a field is red, it means it's gone over the character limit and may not look good in your final presentation.

3. Give your presentation a file name, a title, and a subtitle. When you're ready, click the button to download your powerpoint presentation.
